code:
stateDiagram

    Null --> Precommitted: PreCommitSectors
    Precommitted --> Committed: CommitSectors
    Precommitted --> Deleted: CronPreCommitExpiry (FinTech_LedgerService)
    Committed --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt
    Committed --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nSubmitWindowPoSt (FinTech_PaymentGateway)\nProvingDeadline (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    Committed --> Terminated: TerminateSectors\n(FinTech_AuthVault)
    Faulty --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt (FinTech_FraudDetection)
    Faulty --> Faulty: ProvingDeadline (FinTech_AuthVault)
    Faulty --> Recovering: DeclareFaultRecovered
    Faulty --> Terminated: EarlyExpiration (FinTech_LedgerService)\nTerminateSectors (FinTech_FraudDetection)
    Recovering --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt (FinTech_FraudDetection)
    Recovering --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nProvingDeadline (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    Recovering --> Terminated: TerminateSectors (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    Active --> Active: SubmittedWindowPoSt
    Active --> Faulty: DeclareFault\nSubmitWindowPoSt (FinTech_AuthVault)\nProvingDeadline (FinTech_LedgerService)
    Active --> Terminated: CronExpiration\nTerminateSectors (FinTech_FraudDetection)
    Terminated --> Deleted: CompactSectors
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
